Package it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Controller
    Represents the Controller of the MVC pattern.
    ControllerFactory
    Abstract factory used by controllers to create the other controllers they need.
    PersistentView
    Represents an extension of the View of a player, which is used by the controller.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControllerImpl
    Implementation of the Controller, which uses PersistentViews to decorate the player's views.
    MatchBootstrapper
    This is responsible for asking a player the initial configuration of the match.
    PaymentHandler
    Offers a service to other classes of the controller to handle the payment of a certain cost expressed in AmmoCubeCost from a given player.
    PersistentViewImpl
    Implementation of PersistentView by decorating RemoteView Uses a RequestManager to handle requests to the user and a ScheduledExecutorService for the timer.
    StandardControllerFactory
    Default implementation of controller factory
